formBlocks.title: Basic
formBlocks.content: Provide information about the item you are listing. This affects how the item is shown in social networks and on search results.

inputs.label: Game played in
inputs.name: form_game
inputs.help: If this item was played in a game please enter the details here, otherwise leave blank.

inputs.label: Short social description
inputs.name: form_social
inputs.help: This is the short one or two sentence description that will be used to describe the item when shared on social networks like Twitter and Facebook.

inputs.label: Full page description
inputs.name: form_description
inputs.help: This is the full description that will appear on the Contrib auction page alongside the bidding box etc. It may contain a limited amount of HTML formatting.

formBlocks.title: Photos
formBlocks.content: Provide a number of photos that show the item off from a couple of angles as well as any standout markings, endorsements etc.

formBlocks.title: Video
formBlocks.content: Provide a single video (preferably in portrait mode) that shows the item off and talks to what makes it special.

formBlocks.title: Starting price
formBlocks.content: The starting price for the item which determines the minimum amount that can be bid. The item will not sell if no bids at or above this price are received.

formBlocks.title: Duration
formBlocks.content: How long the auction should run for.

formBlocks.title: Charity
formBlocks.content: What charity will benefit from the proceeds of this auction.

title: Complete
content: Thank you! Your listing is now viewable and will start at the specified time.
